name: tangolint
description: Tango Controls device-server linting: T-codes (Tango-specific) and G-codes (general Python), without compaints about Tango specific syntax.

tangolint.pythonPath.markdownDescription: Path to the Python interpreter used to run `tangolint.py`. Defaults to the active Python extension interpreter, then `python3`.

tangolint.linterPath.markdownDescription: Absolute path to `tangolint.py`. Defaults to the bundled script inside the extension; set this only if you want to use a custom version.

tangolint.lintOnChange.description: Lint while typing as well as on save. Uses a 600 ms debounce.

tangolint.lintOnSave.description: Lint when a file is saved.

tangolint.lintOnOpen.description: Lint when a file is opened.

tangolint.rules.T001.description: [T001 · warning] Device class name should start with an uppercase letter.

tangolint.rules.T010.description: [T010 · error] device_property must have a type annotation.

tangolint.rules.T011.description: [T011 · warning] device_property name should use PascalCase.

tangolint.rules.T020.description: [T020 · warning] Tango @attribute method should have a docstring.

tangolint.rules.T021.description: [T021 · error] Tango @attribute method must have a return-type annotation.

tangolint.rules.T022.description: [T022 · info] Attribute 'name' config key differs from the method name.

tangolint.rules.T023.description: [T023 · warning] Tango @attribute should include a 'description' parameter.

tangolint.rules.T024.description: [T024 · info] Tango @attribute may need a 'unit' parameter.

tangolint.rules.T025.description: [T025 · info] Tango @attribute body may need quality validation via set_validity.

tangolint.rules.T030.description: [T030 · warning] Tango @command method should have a docstring.

tangolint.rules.T031.description: [T031 · info] Tango @command name should use PascalCase.

tangolint.rules.T032.description: [T032 · error] Tango device classes must not override __init__; use init_device() instead.

tangolint.rules.T040.description: [T040 · warning] device_property should have a default_value.

tangolint.rules.T041.description: [T041 · info] device_property should have a 'doc' parameter.

tangolint.rules.T042.description: [T042 · info] Tango device class should define init_device().

tangolint.rules.T043.description: [T043 · warning] __del__() is unreliable in Tango; use delete_device() instead.

tangolint.rules.T044.description: [T044 · info] Tango @attribute should have a 'label' parameter.

tangolint.rules.T045.description: [T045 · warning] READ_WRITE @attribute should have a corresponding write_<name>() method.

tangolint.rules.T046.description: [T046 · warning] time.sleep() inside a device method blocks the Tango event loop.

tangolint.rules.T047.description: [T047 · warning] threading.Thread in a device class; prefer Tango green mode or DeviceThread.

tangolint.rules.T049.description: [T049 · info] @command with arguments or return value should declare dtype_in / dtype_out.

tangolint.rules.G001.description: [G001 · warning] Bare except clause catches every exception; specify the type.

tangolint.rules.G002.description: [G002 · warning] Empty except block silently swallows exceptions.

tangolint.rules.G003.description: [G003 · warning] Use 'is'/'is not' when comparing against None, True, or False.

tangolint.rules.G004.description: [G004 · warning] Mutable default argument; use None and initialise inside the function.

tangolint.rules.G005.description: [G005 · warning] Star import pollutes the namespace; import names explicitly.

tangolint.rules.G006.description: [G006 · info] Multiple modules on one import line; use separate statements.

tangolint.rules.G007.description: [G007 · info] Line exceeds the maximum allowed length.

tangolint.rules.G008.description: [G008 · info] print() in a device class method; use Tango stream methods instead.
